revised_title: Zebrafish Phylogenetic Position and Its Significance in Developmental Biology
tldr: The authors present a DNA-based phylogeny of zebrafish and other related species, revealing the zebrafish's evolutionary relations within the genus Danio and the Cyprinidae family. This study invites developmental biologists to use the comparative method to explore the function and evolution of zebrafish developmental biology in a phylogenetic context.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
